website_summaries.verdict: The stylish pattern on this slipcover adds an extra touch of elegance.
pros: Fits most recliners up to 40" wide
Comes in navy, grey, aqua and walnut brown
cons: Does not stay in place when you sit on furniture

customer_reviews.title: Best Recliner Cover
customer_reviews.text: Third time's a charm. That's right, this is the third time I've bought a recliner cover. This is the solution for an ugly bonded leather recliner that's peeling everywhere. Otherwise, it would have gone in the dumpster. I love that it's one piece, stretchy, and velvety soft. It's so pretty I will probably get one in brown in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I had a slip cover for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I had a slip cover for a recliner that was four pieces or maybe 5 - they'd always come undone and didn't hold up to the dogs, cat, children, or husband! This however is perfect! It's durable, soft, sure I have to tuck it back in before company comes over because the kids, dog, or husband squirmed a bit too much and made it a little messy. But I love it! No piling, no pulls, and soft - did I mention its soft. One of my dogs loves soft things and she's been so happy snuggling with me on these - got the sofa, love seat, and recliner slip covers. Oh and the price - total win!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Fully and Reclined are not four letter words ...
customer_reviews.text: .... but that’s what I’ve been yelling out trying to figure these things out. Been wrestling with these things for a month not realizing the chair needs to be fully reclined. The instructions don’t mention that and the diagram doesn’t either. When I finally tried it that way, it took me less than 5 minutes per chair. Minor detail and major frustration but they look pretty good I think.
customer_reviews.author: I used to be funky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfy. Fit my husband's large recliner just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Covers!
customer_reviews.text: They made our old, dull chairs look new! Now, these recliners are at least 20 years old. They are small and have lost much of their 'fluff', so the covers look a little big, but tucking took care of most of it! I'm very happy with how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: AGirlinWonderland

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this recliner cover so much that we ordered a 2nd immediately for the other recliner. It fits well, has a tad bit to spare that tucks in. This has the recliner lever hole on the right hand side and a remote control pocket on the left side. The 2nd order came with a card stating the company has a 3 year warranty on their products. Very soft! The pillow cover also came from Amazon : ChezMax Rabbit Throw Pillow Cover, and we love the whimsy and the color.
customer_reviews.author: mismatch

customer_reviews.title: I Almost threw my recliner AWAY!!
customer_reviews.text: I was 2 seconds from tossing my recliner in the garbage because I hated the color plus the color was fading away! My friend put me on to these slip covers and brought it back to life!!! 🙌🏼😍🤗 Im sooo happy I listened! The cover is soooo soft and thick! Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika J

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my recliner
customer_reviews.text: My recliner back was far too tall to make this fit, stretched fully with the cover over the back I was only able to get it to cover about 2/3's. the recliner in the photo looks more like a classic shape, then mine which has more bulk to fit. But it was very soft and I have the couch and sofa versions of these and love them, super easy to wash. Just wash them with out other things like bedding or towels, otherwise that stuff will get tangled up in the couch covers since they're so long!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: and it looks awesome! Definitely exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I got this to cover a leather chair that my cat had scratched to shreds, and it looks awesome! Definitely exceeded my expectations. Durable, comfortable material, affordable, and so far indestructible. I would highly recommend this chair cover!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K Lutzy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about these things. I Love Love love this!!!i had a recliner that was starting to peel. My kids bought it for me so it has sentimental value and I didn’t want to get rid of it. This cover is perfect. The recliner is oversized and the cover fit perfectly. The pins are for sure a necessity. They give the cover that perfect shard look. Highly recommend. And it’s like sitting on a cozy blanket!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: updated and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: this completely transformed a 20 yo lazyboy! i can actually say im proud of it with my nicer furniture. i added a beautiful throw and a designer pillow and ooh lala, it looks GREAT. it feels good, too and everybody wants to sit on it. the trellis pattern is what makes it. OH, and oddly it NEVER untucks so this is a real bonus!! i never have to fool with it!! im SO pleased!
customer_reviews.author: EPH320

customer_reviews.title: It stays in place and looks great !!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased ! This is the first slip cover I have ever been happy with. It took a little bit of time to get in place BUT it actually looks great and STAYS in place. That's a first in my experience. I would surely recommend.The fabric is soft and comfortable. I bought the recliner cover. I will probably get one for my loveseat.I have grandchildren who visit a lot. The cover can be tossed right in the washer and dryer. Another great thing.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice, but shifts around a bit.
customer_reviews.text: My recliner is pretty much the largest it could be for the cover. It looks really nice but does shift around about. The straps help keep it in place. The footrest part is the most difficult to keep straight, but overall it has given the comfortable old recliner a new look. We've only been using it a few weeks, so we'll see how it holds up long term.
customer_reviews.author: Cherbear

customer_reviews.title: It fits well
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this cover!! So easy to put on the chair, fits very well, and fabric is soft. The hint of stuffing rolled up magazines in the chair to hold everything tucked in, that is genius!!! I feel like I have a brand new piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Too Stretchy and Hard to Put On
customer_reviews.text: These were the first recliner covers I tried. It was quite a struggle getting them on the chair. At first, I liked the fabric, but after a couple of weeks, they were too stretchy and were very hard to adjust. Took them off and tried to adjust but that was more of a struggle than the first time putting them on. Don't buy these if you are elderly as you will not be able to manage them. I took them off and bought different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very cute pattern!
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft, more like a pillow or blanket material. It is very attractive though and easy to install! I used the twist pins to hold it in place and tidy up the edges. It looks good in our space! It was packaged nicely. We have a relatively big lazyboy recliner and it worked for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric and cute design
customer_reviews.text: A little confusing to install, but a wonderful coverup to spruce up any old chair! And the fabric is so snuggly!!!
customer_reviews.author: altitudefever

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for my dirty ugly chair
customer_reviews.text: I put very little effort to find outif this would fit my chair before I bought it. It fits perfectly. I recommend getting fabric screws and using them to keep the tucked in fabric set.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quick, incredibly soft although I have not washed it yet so we will see how it holds up. I haven’t quite gotten it completely tucked in just right but it has plenty of fabric to fit my large recliner. Nice product to cover up an old recliner, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca VanDuzer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how to put it on
customer_reviews.text: So I never got this product figured out and it is basically a really cute wadded up blanket on my chair. I’m convinced I just don’t know how to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a blue leather rocker-recliner from someone and it had been clawed up by a cat (and smelled of cigarettes). My toddler claimed the chair as her own, and after much cleaning (no more cigarettes) and getting this cover, she loves the chair even more! It didn't fit 100%, but it fit well enough!
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as they make it look
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy to put on a recliner at all. The directions don’t mention anything about what to do with the elastic loops inside the fabric. I have a white monte design recliner that I’m trying to protect. After fighting with the slip cover for an hour I’m just leaving it draped like a sheet. There must be an easier way than this!
customer_reviews.author: Dphilip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for that worn in recliner.
customer_reviews.text: I have a compact recliner that I was pretty sure I would never find a cover that fit. Well this one does but has enough stretch that it looks like it would fit a standard size as well. I wasn’t sure about the material at first, I thought I would get too warm sitting on the plush but it’s super soft and cozy but doesn’t overheat.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd color I’ve bought. Great item! Received fast, & easy to put on recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Had purchased one that wasn’t plush and the plush is so much nicer and appears to be more durable. Use the twisty screw pins to attach to the underside of your chair. Stays snuggly fitted quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice well made product! Have had it for months and still looks good . Considering my cats are alway on the chair !
customer_reviews.author: elida

customer_reviews.title: Love it, even though it doesn't fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an older La-Z-Boy, so the arms a bit wider and are not flush with the seat cushion, but we managed to fit it on and still look good. The material is soft and appears to be good quality. Great and cheap way to update a room. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: River2008

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $. Easy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Washed, dried well, easy to clean, stylish and so easy to put on the recliner. Saved our really old stained recliner we wanted to get rid if. It even opens nicely still.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: This fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to cover my lazy boy leather recliner, to protect it from a new kitten. I love this cover! It soft and not snaggy like so many. Fit perfect and a great price to boot! I recommend it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dean

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good value.
customer_reviews.text: I had extremely low expectations for this but wanted to facelift my lazy boy. It’s phenomenal. So incredibly soft, couldn’t be easier to install, and looks fantastic. Now I’m thinking my sofa and love seat are going to get an update!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Not exact fit.
customer_reviews.text: Cover looks ok.material is soft.fits well. A little expensive.havent washed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover! I tried to post a before and after but was only able to post one picture. I put this over an old peeling leather recliner. This is in color the gray, and was very easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. One of the straps broke a couple days after installing it. Easy fix with a little sewing. Soft and cute design. Gets a bit warm after a while especially on hot days. You do have to tuck it back in after getting up. All in all pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten so many compliments on this chair cover, it looks really nice & feels amazing. Easy to put on and doesn’t have that sloppy, ill-fitting look some slip covers have.
customer_reviews.author: BossLadi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy !
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair cover ! I have a big recliner and I thought this wouldn't fit when I ordered it but, it stretches to fit and it's perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: natalise

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this slip cover. It transformed my grandma looking recliner. Super soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: TRide

customer_reviews.title: Color in photo misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the recliner cover in walnut brown expecting a dark brown as depicted in the photo sample above. The color I received is very pale and looks much more like the gray. Very disappointed, does not match anything I have and is borderline ugly. The only good thing I can say is that it is very soft to sit on and touch.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Soft, Easy to Put on
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this cover on my recliner and have gotten so many comments on it. It’s SO soft, you just want to melt into it. It’s so much easier to put on than the covers with 4 pieces, it’s oversized so it just tucks into the cushions. If it goes out of place, just tuck it back in.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice and so is the pattern. It does not fit my recliner well. It is too big and slides around on it since it’s leather.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: COZY
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fits, so comfy--not thin and flimsy like the last cover we ordered. Makes our old beat up couch look so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Seate-beck

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Soft and beautiful cover that fits perfectly onto my oversized recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Soto

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits great.. love the material it’s very soft .. it covered my ugly recliner i putvin My living room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with cover.Soft, excellent size for my recliner. I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Shpungin

customer_reviews.title: Nice covers
customer_reviews.text: Covers are good quality, but the brown is a little off, but I really like the look. I have 2 different recliners, it fit the bulky leather recliner well but the fabric recliner doesn’t fit as nice. It looks great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is absolutely perfect!! It's super soft, easy to put on & looks beautiful on my recliner. Perfect fit! I bought the Taupe with the design & the color is true & very pretty. I'm ordering another one for the recliner in my second living room now.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Brock

customer_reviews.title: Two very different “greys.”
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I opened the package and fitted the first one onto our recliners. My review is because when I unpackaged and fitted the second one; it was very obvious although they’re both marked “grey,” one is a noticeably different shade. I am returning these two and reordering hoping they’re both identical this time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are not correct.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric kept static cling in it and it did not fit what I ordered it for. Dimensions should have been correct, but the item did not fit once I tried to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Sirois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slip cover for our over-sized recliner! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fit is difficult material clings to chair so hard to move it over chair.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to fit . I’m still working with it. May return.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Weird material
customer_reviews.text: The material looks and feels like short fake fur or material used for stuffed animal toys I waited over a week to receive it I didn't bother trying it on for fit Returned it today.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: fits great but I wish them made some I could just ...
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs and the hair sticks to the chair. fits great but I wish them made some I could just wipe off.. Maybe asking for too much
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: but disappointed with the color
customer_reviews.text: Fits well; but disappointed with the color. I thought it was to be green but its looks brown.
customer_reviews.author: Lula N.

customer_reviews.title: Better than pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this Navy blue cover. Super soft and fit our recliner well! Pictures don't do it justice. I would definitely purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Borgschatz

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome covers! I actually bought two and put one over a beat up classroom chaise lounge.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really fit the recliner we bought it for, but it’s better than what we had. We used a fitted sheet of similar solid color to cover the parts of the chair that the cover didn’t hide.
customer_reviews.author: EmerA

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the fabric however it was really hard to figure out
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Liked the fit
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fit, did not slip off and felt comfortable, the fact that you can wash it, were the most important things
customer_reviews.author: lee w.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: This fits all my recliners it is soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: good material
customer_reviews.text: I like the material, and the price was good, just hard to figure out how it goes on, overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to upgrade old furniture
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and looked great! The perfect upgrade for my old, hand-me-down furniture. Soft and comfortable to sit on. Reasonably priced, so if it needs to be replaced down the road, it won’t be devastating. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My husband refused to give up his comfortable recliner, but needless to say it had seen better days. With this cover, it is like a brand new chair and it definitely stays put, not like others I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it looks so cute and so easy to clean where I’ve got kids and dogs. It doesn’t fit as snug as pictures though but I still really like it and it’s so soft
customer_reviews.author: Bertie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Covering a chair my cat loves to climb. Holds up well, and has straps to go around legs. Thick enough not to wrinkle and looks really well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne C. Steinke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels fantastic. Super easy to put on, maybe 2-3 minutes. I was worried it wouldn’t stay put on leather, but it does! Covers up the ugly shedding and adds a little umph to the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this! It is so soft and I’m really impressed with how thick the fabric is. It’s added a whole new life to the worn down family recliner!
customer_reviews.author: taylor bell

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric and fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the plush fabric... Does not pick up fuzz, lint and feels great and cozy. Much better than those stretchy polyester covers
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to cover a very worn and ripped recliner, looks like I spent hundreds on a new one! The material feels great, my kids fight over who is going to sit on it. It should be very easy to wash. Great product and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L.

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair cover
customer_reviews.text: After using tacs we also purchased, it stays on well. We still tuck every now and then after sitting but it looks like a brand new store bought chair. Love it! We tacked I’m in the back and all down side next to seam every 4 in with decorative tacks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than I expected! Soft material and good color.
customer_reviews.author: Cayleigh Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit our old recliners perfectly and are soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly S

customer_reviews.title: Super soft! Recommend buying the upholstery pins to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! Recommend buying the upholstery pins to keep from moving. Less itchy then the twill ones I bought last time
customer_reviews.author: fancy girl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cover in every way. The only improvement would be tighter elastic around the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Nice material but confusing on putting them on
customer_reviews.text: Nice material but confusing on putting them on, I will not dry them because they are already kind of miss shapen.
customer_reviews.author: Bellaluz Navarro

customer_reviews.title: It’s soft but looks a mess
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t look good. It looks a mess and doesn’t stay on or look as pictured. It already has a whole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lane

customer_reviews.title: Transformed my living room
customer_reviews.text: Bought me at least another year on having to buy new furniture
customer_reviews.author: Ilin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Soft, machine washable, and pretty. The old, beat up "dad chair" is now my favorite spot in the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Damaged as received.
customer_reviews.text: The stitches were broken already off shipping package. The material feels good. Looks like need to spend some time to fit it right on my recliner glider chair. Returning this damaged product and may be will order another one.
customer_reviews.author: yuvava

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks on my recliner 💫 i wish I can give 10, ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Onate

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! Made our old recliner brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is so soft and plush. Very easy ti put over my recliner. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Fit great and looks fantastic! Made the chair very cozy!!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia D

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits our recliners perfectly. Material is soft and color is as described. Would definitely order from Great Bay Home again, very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbs

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit our large recliner Perfect! Bought because we got new couches and wanted to keep our recliner but it didn't match, super soft feels like a fuzzy blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Dany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fit and love the soft material!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the cover! I also love the soft material. For the price, I would recommend it to give a recliner a face lift.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Teston

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a brand new recliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fabric-even after you sit on it the cover stays in place. We've had this recliner for 15 years-nothing wrong with it except worn upholstery-this cover did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I purchased this for my recliner and it was so easy to put on it’s very soft as well,
customer_reviews.author: maria navarro

customer_reviews.title: ... on my recliner but for the money it's a good deal. Needs a way to secure the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was a little big on my recliner but for the money it's a good deal. Needs a way to secure the bottom on the front and in back and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Baird

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a standard recliner
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit. Slides off. Doesn’t stay tucked in. Very unhappy with this product. Put right back in the box but missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern and softness, and our cats cant seem to shred it! Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: Lenard D.

customer_reviews.title: FIT IS EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: THE PATTERN WAS TRUE TO THE PICTURE SHOWN. I COVERED A LARGE RECLINER AND IT FIR PERFECTLY.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Material is soft, very pretty, but there was a giant hole in the seat. Too bad..
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to update!
customer_reviews.text: Generous fit, gorgeous fabric. Haven’t had long enough to clean or test durability.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ring

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Once you put it on correctly, it's a really nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Trivett

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a recliner that did not match anything in it's current state. I put it on incorrectly at first, but once i patiently followed the directions it went on smoothly. It's very soft and is nice. I will buy upholstery pins just to hold it in place, but I think that is the same with all covers. For the price point I am pleased. I have two pictures. The floor in my office is unfinished at the moment, flooring coming this spring, but with new painted shelves and my rug, I am pleased with the slipcover. You can never go wrong ordering from Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Love, love,love this!
customer_reviews.text: Stretches and fits so nice. This is an old lazyboy chair in nasty blue, but it worked nice. I really liked the cover, but wasn't suree it would fit. The directions are vague. All it says is start at bottom back and stretch to fit. Need to do a lot of tucking!!! I would rate it 4 stars for that, but I really love the feel and look!
customer_reviews.author: jmreviews

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this as our recliner is quite bulky, but the cover fit really well. There are a few straps that I have no idea what to do with, but other than that the installation was pretty easy. A few fabric pins could help smooth out the fit, but it is fine as is (picture does not include any pins). The cover does require a little retucking after use, but that was expected and again, pins would help prevent that. Fabric is a soft, velvety texture. Overall, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nicer material than I thought it would be. Still not impressed with the price, was more than I wanted to spend but I wanted to make sure it would fit the bigger chair I have. Very nice, will probably buy more for the rest of furniture in the future when I have the money. The only thing is it’s a little confusing trying to get it on, not looking forward to having to take it on off to wash as I’m the material is a hair catcher and I have 2 dogs and a cat. Overall I like it ☺️
customer_reviews.author: dan shone

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! it fits surprisingly well on my recliner. I did get upholstery screws that I have not put in yet. It's fairly easy to install. I love the remote pocket! What a bonus! It is super soft and comfy. the only reason I took off a star is because when we got it there was a faded spot by the head. Other than that it's absolutely perfect! I cannot wait to get one for my couch to match!
customer_reviews.author: m kost

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Recliner cover is well made. The material is soft, plush and rich looking. It fits perfectly. My only complaint is that it needs to be tucked each time you get off of it. I don't think there's anyway to prevent this with any slipcover. It's just the nature of the beast! Anyway, it's keeping my chair protected and clean. With a new puppy in the house who likes to cuddle on the chair with me or my husband, this is a godsend!
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gray (and white) color.. not charcoal
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this recliner cover. I put it on a small recliner in our bedroom and it totally changed the bedroom. I can't say anything about durability because I just received it, but I think it will last a while. I used a few fabric pins and it made it look even nicer. One of the best purchases I've made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: AnnonCA

product_meta.title: Great Bay Home Modern Velvet Plush Recliner Slipcover. Strapless One Piece Stretch Recliner Cover. Recliner Cover for Living Room. Magnolia Collection Slipcover. (Recliner, Navy)
feature_bullets: PROTECT: This slipcover shields and protects your furniture from spills, stains, wear and tear to prevent it from getting everyday mishaps. It’s great for homes with children and pets.
FITS MOST FURNITURE: Our STRETCH slipcovers are one-size-fits-most. Our Slipcovers fit most Recliners up to 40 inches wide. PLEASE MEASURE BEFORE PURCHASING.
STAYS IN PLACE: This slipcover is conveniently STRAPLESS and SLIP RESISTANT with an ELASTICIZED BOTTOM. Includes Side Pocket Detail.

LIGHTWEIGHT, COMFORTABLE AND EASY CARE: Available in a variety of prints and solid colors that will freshen up any home décor! MACHINE WASHABLE: Durable, high-quality material designed for long lasting use and enjoyment.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: 10-year “no questions asked” guarantee. Buy with confidence!
